media:group.media:title: ีีธึีขีฅีถ ีีกึีคีกีถีตีกีถีจ ีถีธึ ีทีกึีชีธึีด ีง ีฝีฏีฝีธึีด
media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีซีฝีซ 18-ีซีถ ีีฟีฅึีกีถีกีฏีฅึีฟีธึีด ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีพ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีบีฅีฟีถีกีญีกึีกึ ีีธึีขีฅีถ ีีกึีคีกีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐึีกีพีซึีกีฎ ีถีธึ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีถีคีกีดีถีฅึีซ ีกีฝีธึีฌีซีฝีจึ ีีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีธีนีพีธึีด ีง ยซิฑึึีกีญีซ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีณีกีฏีกีฟยป ีฐีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีทีกึีชีธึีด, ีธึีจ ีฐีผีนีกีฏีกีฃีซึ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึึีฅึึ ิฑีฝีธึีฌีซีฝีซีถ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีดีซ ีทีกึึ ีฐีกึึีฅึ ีธึีฒีฒีฅึ ีีกึีคีกีถีตีกีถีซีถ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีถีฅึึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ

entry.title: Pashinyan confirms new meeting next week with Aliyev, Putin, despite border tensions

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan confirms new meeting next week with Aliyev, Putin, despite border tensions
media:group.media:description:
๐Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said today that he had accepted a proposal from Russian President Vladimir Putin to meet with him and Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev next Thursday in Moscow. ๐An Armenian serviceman has died en route to the hospital after being wounded when Azerbaijani forces opened fire yesterday on Armenian positions near the village of Sotk. ๐Armenian law enforcement has detained one woman and launched a criminal investigation after Ashot Pashinyan, the only son of Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, reported yesterday that a group of people tried to kidnap him in Yerevan.

media:group.media:title: ีีกีถีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีผีธึึึีกีขีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ึ ีขีธึีชีดีกีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด. ีฆึีธึีตึ ิณึีธึีฃ ินีกีดีกีดีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ
media:group.media:description:
ีึีผีธึึึีกีขีกีถ, ีกึีตีธึีถีกีขีกีถ ิณึีธึีฃ ินีกีดีกีดีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึึีธึีด ีง ีดีกีถีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีผีธึึึีกีขีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ีขีธึีชีดีกีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด: ีีฌีธึีฟีซ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีถีก ีฏีกึึีธึีธึีด ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีดีกีตีซีฝีซ 18-21-ีจ ีกีถึีฏีกึีพีธีฒ ีีกีถีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีผีธึึึีกีขีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีดีซีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีฝีซีกีฏีกีถ 15-ึีค ีฐีกีดีกีชีธีฒีธีพีจ: ีีซีปีธึีกีผีดีกีถีจ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีกีฐีผีนีกีฏ ีฃีซีฟีถีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ีขีชีซีทีฏีถีฅึีจ ีฏึีถีถีกึีฏีฅีถ ึีกีฒึีฏีฅีฒีซ ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีถีฅึีซ ีกีญีฟีธึีธีทีดีกีถ ึ ีขีธึีชีดีกีถ ีกีผีกีถีฑีถีกีฐีกีฟีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีถีกึ ีณีกีผีกีฃีกีตีฉีกีตีซีถ ีธึ ีพีซึีกีฐีกีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีขีธึีชีดีกีถ ีถีธึีกีฃีธึีตีถ ีดีธีฟีฅึีธึีดีถีฅึีจ:

entry.title: US trying to push Russia out of Armenia, Russian foreign minister says

media:group.media:title: US trying to push Russia out of Armenia, Russian foreign minister says
media:group.media:description:
๐Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov accused the United States of working to destabilize the situation in the South Caucasus and encouraging Armenia to drive Russia out of the country. ๐Lavrov also said the situation in the region would be more stable had Armenia agreed last autumn to host an observer mission from the CSTO, a Russian-led military alliance. ๐The U.S. State Department placed Azerbaijan on a special watch list for the destruction of Armenian religious and cultural heritage sites under its control in and around Nagorno-Karabakh. ๐Armeniaโs National Security Service said it seized a large cocaine shipment, one day after Italian law enforcement officers said they had intercepted more than 2.7 tons of cocaine bound for Armenia from Ecuador.
Credits: Ruptly

entry.title: Did Armeniaโs 2018 Velvet Revolution upset the geopolitical architecture of the region?

media:group.media:title: Did Armeniaโs 2018 Velvet Revolution upset the geopolitical architecture of the region?
media:group.media:description:
Nerses Kopalyan, professor of political science at the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, sits down with CivilNet as Armenia marks five years since the Velvet Revolution that catapulted Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan to power. Kopalyan argues that the events of 2018 were not a color revolution, despite similarities with the Georgian and Ukrainian revolutions of the early 2000s. Kopalyan also discusses the main points of improvement in Armenia since the change in government and examines the widespread grievances that led to the revolution five years ago.

entry.title: TURKEY VOTES: Erdoฤan, Turkish opposition and Armenia normalization

media:group.media:title: TURKEY VOTES: Erdoฤan, Turkish opposition and Armenia normalization
media:group.media:description:
In the run-up to the second round of Turkeyโs presidential elections, Aras Editor-in-Chief Rober Koptaล joins CivilNet to discuss the potential foreign policy approaches of both President Erdoฤan and the opposition leader Kemal Kฤฑlฤฑรงdaroฤlu. Koptaล also discusses how the two contenders for the presidency may approach relations with Armenia and the normalization process.

media:group.media:title: ิฑึีฐีฅีฝีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีธึีฝีธึึีนีซีถ ีฝีฟีซีบีธึีด ีง ึีธีญีพีฅีฌ
media:group.media:description:
ิฑีทีญีกึีฐีจ ีกึีกีฃ ึีธีญีพีธึีด ีง, ีกีตีถึีกีถ ีกึีกีฃ, ีธึ ีดีกึีคีซีฏ ีธีน ีดีซีกีตีถ ีนีฅีถ ีฐีกีฝึีถีธึีด ีกึีฑีกีฃีกีถึีฅีฌ ีกีตีค ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซีถ, ีกีตีฌึ ีฃีซีฟีกีฏึีฅีฌ ีคึีกีถึึ ิฑึีคีตีธึีถึีธึีด ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีง ีฏีกึึีธึีพีธึีด ีญีซีฆีกีญ ีกีผีกีปีถีธึีค ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ ีธึีฝีธึึีนีซ ีฏีกึีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีนีงี ีธึ ีถีก ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฏีกึีธีฒีกีถีก ีธึีฒีฒีธึีคีฅีฌ ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีซีถ ีกีถีธึีธีท ึ ีกึีกีฃ ึีธึีธีญีพีธีฒ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีฅีปึ ิฑึีฐีฅีฝีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีฒีฉีกึีทีกีพีจ ีขีธีฌีธึ ีธึีฝีธึึีซีนีถีฅึีซึ ีบีกีฐีกีถีปีธึีด ีง ีกีดีขีธีฒีปีกีบีฅีฝ ีพีฅึีกีถีกีตีฅีฌ ีซึีฅีถึ ีคีฅึีกีฏีกีฟีกึีธึีดีจึ
